helmet (lvl 8 - unique)

item id [id]: 194

protection, head [prothead]: 25

(cause-eyeloss [eyeloss])

Requires 15W15A to forge (W3A3)

This helmet is perfect. The men whose leader wears this helmet are very unlikely to break, and any enemy who tries to strike against the helmet will be struck by awe or have one of his eyes put out for his impudence.
